languages.text: "Моя школа..." {n}— одобрительно-ворчливо говорит Абеляр под нос. Не уточняя, имеет он в виду лейтенанта Вент, нависающую над ней Иокасту или обеих.{/n}
"So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Моя школа..." {n}— одобрительно-ворчливо говорит Абеляр под нос. Не уточняя, имеет он в виду лейтенанта Вент, нависающую над ней Иокасту или обеих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Lieutenant Vent, the officer looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “看来，我的教导还是有人听进去了……”{n}阿贝拉德喃喃自语，表示赞同。不过他并没指明是赞同温特，还是赞同站在她身前、身材高大的苏尔贝克，或者两者都是。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看来，我的教导还是有人听进去了……”{n}阿贝拉德喃喃自语，表示赞同。不过他并没指明是赞同温特，还是赞同站在她身前、身材高大的苏尔贝克，或者两者都是。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «De modo que no todas mis lecciones son en vano...». {n}Abelard murmura con aprobación, pero molesto. No queda claro si se refiere a Vent, a Sauerback que se yergue sobre ella o a ambas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De modo que no todas mis lecciones son en vano...». {n}Abelard murmura con aprobación, pero molesto. No queda claro si se refiere a Vent, a Sauerback que se yergue sobre ella o a ambas.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「我が教えがすべて耳に入らないわけではないのだな…」{n}アベラルドは怒りと納得が入り混じったかのようにつぶやく。それがヴェントのことなのか、彼女に迫るザウアーバックのことなのか、あるいはその両方のことなのか、判然とはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我が教えがすべて耳に入らないわけではないのだな…」{n}アベラルドは怒りと納得が入り混じったかのようにつぶやく。それがヴェントのことなのか、彼女に迫るザウアーバックのことなのか、あるいはその両方のことなのか、判然とはしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Es stoßen also nicht all meine Lektionen auf taube Ohren ...", {n}murmelt Abelard anerkennend. Er führt nicht weiter aus, ob er Vent meint, Sauerback, die sich vor ihr aufgebaut hat, oder beide.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es stoßen also nicht all meine Lektionen auf taube Ohren ...", {n}murmelt Abelard anerkennend. Er führt nicht weiter aus, ob er Vent meint, Sauerback, die sich vor ihr aufgebaut hat, oder beide.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ainsi, tous mes enseignements n'ont pas été vains... » {n}marmonne Abélard en guise d'approbation sans pour autant préciser s'il fait référence à Vent, à Sauerback qui la toise de tout son haut, ou aux deux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, tous mes enseignements n'ont pas été vains... » {n}marmonne Abélard en guise d'approbation sans pour autant préciser s'il fait référence à Vent, à Sauerback qui la toise de tout son haut, ou aux deux.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Demek sözlerimi dinleyen birileri varmış." {n}Abelard, huysuz ama onaylar bir tonla mırıldanıyor ancak Vent'i mi, kadının tepesinde dikilen Sauerback'i mi yoksa her ikisini de mi kastettiği meçhul.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So not all my lessons fall on deaf ears..." {n}Abelard mutters in crabby approval. He does not clarify whether he means Vent, Sauerback looming over her, or both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Demek sözlerimi dinleyen birileri varmış." {n}Abelard, huysuz ama onaylar bir tonda mırıldanıyor ancak Vent'i mi, kadının tepesinde dikilen Sauerback'i mi, yoksa her ikisini de mi kastettiği meçhul.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
